description: Super Properties are properties associated with events that are set once and then sent with every capture call, be it a $pageview, an autocaptured button click, or anything else.

cryptoSDK.description: Which crypto backend is the client currently using.

oneOf.description: Legacy crypto backend specific to each platform.
Cross-platform crypto backend written in Rust.

appPlatform.description: Used by web to identify the platform (Web/Electron)
